channel.title: Comments on: I am Jack’s cold sweat

item.title: By: christopher
item.dc:creator: christopher
item.description: I hope everthing is going good for you now.
item.content:encoded: I hope everthing is going good for you now.

item.title: By: drypulse
item.dc:creator: drypulse
item.description:
i've been neglecting my friends and family since beta.... does that make me a bad person??
oh well fuck it, if they don't like it, i still got my fix.
item.content:encoded:
i’ve been neglecting my friends and family since beta…. does that make me a bad person??

oh well fuck it, if they don’t like it, i still got my fix.

item.title: By: Shin
item.dc:creator: Shin
item.description:
Welcome Raster and happy posting oO
I'm writting this totally useless comment, 'cause when I read the title in my feeds the first thing I thought was "Huh? Yet another Jack Thompson post?", than came Fight Club... Jack Thompson comes up before a favourite movie reference? I hate him with a passion now, before that I was just amused with him.
item.content:encoded:
Welcome Raster and happy posting oO

I’m writting this totally useless comment, ’cause when I read the title in my feeds the first thing I thought was “Huh? Yet another Jack Thompson post?”, than came Fight Club… Jack Thompson comes up before a favourite movie reference? I hate him with a passion now, before that I was just amused with him.

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description: Bold, bitter flavor, goes well with Foton.
item.content:encoded: Bold, bitter flavor, goes well with Foton.

item.title: By: Karnak
item.dc:creator: Karnak
item.description:
Hmmmm you know Finster, thats one of the main reasons I bought WoW as well. Had no intention of ever buying it until started reading first n3rfed and then AFKgamer.
See Foton you are responsible for the neglect I have shown friends and family.
Anyways
Welcome to the club Raster, this should be interesting.
Oh yeah Foton you did remember to go back and delete all the nasty things you said about him right?.....
:D

item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.description:
And now we know the REAL reason Raster was invited to post...
In all seriousness, you guys are hilarious. Your WoW posts were a large ingredient in why I purchased WoW this past month. (Well, that and I'm a masochist.)
Anyway, gotta go play WoW while ignoring my wife.
item.content:encoded:
And now we know the REAL reason Raster was invited to post…

In all seriousness, you guys are hilarious. Your WoW posts were a large ingredient in why I purchased WoW this past month. (Well, that and I’m a masochist.)

Anyway, gotta go play WoW while ignoring my wife.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Dude, you didn't write anything about all those times that I single handedly saved guild raids with my l337 skillz.
I have the screenies to prove it too.
item.content:encoded:
Dude, you didn’t write anything about all those times that I single handedly saved guild raids with my l337 skillz.
